video.title: El Cuerpo del Deseo
video.synopsis: Aging millionaire Pedro Donoso dies suddenly, but he returns to the realm of the living when his soul passes into another man's body.

episodes.synopsis: Pedro José keeps having a dream in which he sees a strange man. Everybody is talking about Pedro José and Isabel's wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Angela tells Isabel that she does not trust her, and she is sure she didn't marry her father for love.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Pedro José gives Nina the money she needs.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Pedro José once again flatters Valeria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Gaetana tells Isabel that she knows what kind of woman she is. Pedro José hears her and warns her to respect his bride and not to abuse his trust.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Pedro José tells Gaetana that, this time around, he felt the suffering of the man in his dreams much more intensely.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Pedro José complains to Nina about certain expenses, and she replies that instead of worrying about that he should be keeping an eye on Angela.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: On the phone, Isabel tells Andrés that she loves him and misses him, and that Pedro José would never suspect her of having a lover.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Pedro asks Walter to take him to his study to play the piano, and he plays like he has never played before.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Angela enters the study to tell her father what she has discovered, but she finds him collapsed and apparently dead on the piano.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: The doctor asks Salvador how he feels; he replies that he is very scared and that he does not understand what is going on.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Salvador's strange behavior continues; he asks to have a bath and requests clean clothes.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Angela discovers Gaetana Charry's information. Isabel orders Walter to kick Azur, Pedro José's dog and friend, out of the house; Angela opposes it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Reporters arrive in the village to investigate the strange events that have taken place. A dead man has come back to life.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Salvador has a breakdown. Isabel threatens Abigail if Antonio and Simon keep helping Angela.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is very depressed, not knowing what really happened.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: The doctor visits Angela and explains that she fainted because of the nervous breakdown she is having.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca and Walter start looking for the safe. They enter the basement and discover a door, but are not able to open it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Isabel feels guilty for her mother's death. Walter keeps searching in the study, and is caught by Simón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Cantalicia reaches the church looking for Salvador and asks Father Jacobo to hand him over. He asks if it is true that Salvador did not study.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Salvador again surprises Father Jacobo with his chess prowess. The villagers are crazy about getting to be with Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: To avoid being taken to the psych ward, Salvador confirms his identity, and that he has a wife and son; he asks to be allowed to go back to his ranch.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Salvador comes out of the ranch. Cantalicia bombards him with questions and he asks her to leave him alone. Rebeca argues with the Donosos' staff.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Salvador asks Cantalicia to wash Monchito, with soap and water. She refuses, so he does it himself. Cantalicia cannot accept how Salvador has changed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Cantalicia looks for Father Jacobo and tells him she is sure that something bad happened to Salvador, because he is not acting like his usual self.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Salvador escapes with part of Lilia's money and gets on a bus to Río Claro. When he arrives, he looks for Gaetana Charry, who refuses to see him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Salvador arrives at the Donoso home and Azur recognizes him. Seeing the ladder that Salvador used, everyone believes that a robber entered the house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Salvador tells Gaetana that Pedro José's spirit is present, and that she can ask him questions to prove it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Simón tells Consuelo that he lost his job at the factory. She tells him to get his job back, otherwise she doesn't want to see him ever again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Antonio argue.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Valeria remains locked up in her room on Isabel's orders. She dreams of Pedro José. Salvador asks her for a job, but she says there is no work.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Simón admits to Antonio that Salvador makes him nervous, and Antonio admits that he feels the same way. Isabel and Andrés return from their trip.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Isabel rebukes Rebeca for having hired Salvador, and adds she doesn't really know him. Isabel tells Angela that Salvador makes her uneasy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Walter declares war on Salvador. Salvador meets with Antonio and tells him certain things that Pedro José had told him long ago.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Salvador continues to sow unease in the Donoso household, reminding them of things that Pedro José had once said.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Azur is captured by the house guard. Andrés gives the order to kill him. Abigail, Antonio, Angela and Simón oppose it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Salvador tells Gaetana that he saw Andrés and Isabel kissing, and thinks they are probably united by the suffering caused by his own death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Gaetana takes Salvador to a bar, and tries to convince them that they should open a bar together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Salvador speaks to Isabel of justice and honor; she asks why he is doing this, and tells him to mind his own business.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Andrés continue to not accept any of this and talk about how much they hated Pedro José and how they are about to inherit everything.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Walter tries to harm Salvador by tampering with the brakes of his car. Angela asks Salvador to take her to the gym.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Isabel have an accident. Salvador is injured. A peasant tries to help them. Isabel gets very nervous seeing Salvador so badly hurt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Isabel tells Rebeca that she grows more and more disappointed by Andrés every day.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Isabel asks Salvador about his friendship with Angela, and asks him to keep her informed of everything Angela does.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Salvador goes into the woods, and Isabel goes and looks for him. They argue, and then they kiss.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Salvador tells Isabel that he knows how she tends to use all the men in her life. Isabel announces her engagement to Andrés.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Isabel fires Salvador because he was not there when she needed him most. He heads for the woods. She follows, harasses and provokes him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Angela hears of Dr. Velaunde's murder. Salvador tells Gaetana that he will not rest until he sees Isabel on her knees in front of him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Simón tells Antonio that he felt that Dr. Donoso was the one who was really taking care of him. Antonio tells Salvador who Consuelo really is.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Salvador arrives while Isabel is trying on her wedding dress. Rebeca speaks very badly of Pedro José in front of Salvador, angering him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Simón walks in on Consuelo and Camilo in bed. Salvador is in the attic; Isabel follows him there and seduces him. He tells her she should not give in.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Andrés tells Isabel that if she wants to exclude him from Pedro's fortune, she will not succeed. He goes crazy and tries to drown her in the tub.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Valeria urges Isabel not to get married. Isabel replies that it is too late to cancel. Simón makes Antonio wonder what Salvador and Angela do.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Andrés get married. Isabel cannot hide her unhappiness.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Antonio asks Angela if she believes in people being possessed by spirits. She replies she does not believe in that sort of thing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: A picture of Isabel and Andrés's wedding appears in the paper, showing Salvador next to them. Angela wonders why Isabel decided to take Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Isabel asks Salvador if it was all Andrés's fault. Andrés finds Isabel taking care of Salvador, and complains.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Andrés continues trying to seduce Isabel, but she rejects him. He gets drunk and throws himself into the sea, but he is saved.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Isabel asks Walter to get rid of Salvador, which is music to Walter's ears. In the factory, people are not happy with Andrés's early return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Isabel confronts Salvador about not having left, and offers to pay him a lot of money if he is prepared to quit and never return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Andrés hires Walter as his personal assistant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Andrés orders Walter to move all Isabel's things to his room, and to destroy all items belonging to Pedro José as well as all photos of him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Angela tells Isabel that if Andrés keeps smearing the memory of her father she will kick him out of the house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Antonio is more and more surprised as he realizes that Salvador talks and thinks as if he were Pedro José Donoso.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Salvador asks Matilda never to tell Rebeca that he lives there. Andrés and Walter talk about how mysterious Salvador is and plan to get rid of him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Andrés orders Walter to follow Angela from now on and to keep him informed of everything she does with Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Antonio is unhappy with the relationship between Angela and Salvador. He complains to Angela, who says she cannot forgive him for not trusting her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Isabel tells Angela that she is too trusting of Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Salvador asks Rebeca to leave him alone and to stop harassing him, and she replies that it is his fault for getting her hopes up.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Abigail and Simón are worried about the whole situation with Antonio. Valeria is very sad because of what Isabel told her about Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Antonio is behaving very strangely; he does not talk, he does not answer questions and when he speaks he is incoherent. He also has a scorching fever.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: An unexplainable event entangles the Donoso household in a web of intrigue. Gaetana gets a surprise.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: The sudden return of Salvador makes many people happy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is engulfed in a deep internal struggle between rancor and passion, leading him to give in to Isabel's temptations.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: The sudden arrival of Cantalicia causes serious problems for Salvador when she catches him in the Donoso household.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Salvador arrives for a rendezvous in an inconspicuous place, where he makes a shady deal with Isabel Arroyo in order to prove how perverse she is.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: A terrible accident caused by Andrés forces the Domínguez family to leave their home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Everything indicates that Abigail and her children will leave the Donoso home very soon, and nothing and no one will make them change their minds.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Matilda and her fiancé celebrate their engagement with a party in Gaetana's bar, but something bad happens and Salvador's son is in serious danger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Andrés cannot stand the strange arrangements, nor Isabel's indifference, and he seeks refuge in the arms of Inárida, his wife Isabel's best friend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: As they are getting ready to leave, Abigail and Simón have a big argument with Walter and Andrés.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Andrés, Walter and Rebeca don't willingly accept Antonio's new position, acquired through his marriage with Angela.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Valeria is surprised when, together with Salvador, she experiences an unexpected moment of intense happiness.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Salvador does not keep his appointment with Isabel or with Rebeca, as he is meeting Antonio in Gaetana's bar to let him know of Ángela's pregnancy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: Isabel gives Abigail her settlement, but Abigail refuses the check saying that she will take it when she leaves the house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Walter impatiently awaits for Abigail and her children to leave the house. Antonio leaves the house with Salvador's help, without anybody realizing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Ángela and Antonio tell everybody they are married and expecting a baby. Ángela requests that Antonio's stuff be moved to his bedroom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Salvador meet again at Inírida's apartment. Simón gets ready to go with Valeria to the concert.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Ángela decides to get involved in the company's affairs together with Salvador and meets the directors of Cítricos Donoso.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Abigail is taken aback by Isabel's indifference towards Andrés's illness. Rebeca rebukes Salvador for having left her alone.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Andrés reproaches Isabel for her indifference towards the allocation of Pedro José Donoso's assets, since he thinks Ángela will inherit it all.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Ángela suggests that Cítricos Donosos hire Salvador Cerinza as an industrial relations assistant in light of his astounding knowledge of the company.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Simón are hired by the company, which annoys Andrés. The relationship between Isabel and Andrés is more tense every day.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Simón reveals to Antonio his immense love for Valeria, while Valeria and Salvador's love keeps on growing every day.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca tries to blackmail Salvador by threatening to reveal his secret. Isabel keeps on asking Salvador to tell her the truth.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Andrés hires people to carry out his plan to kill Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is attacked, but escapes unscathed. Andrés makes a new attempt to murder Isabel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: At the Donosos', the situation gets really tense because of the beating Andrés gave Isabel, which left her badly injured.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Salvador asks Valeria to marry him and tries to persuade her to leave Isabel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Isabel looks for Salvador at the company and tells him she is despairing for Andrés's health.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Salvador looks for clues as to Isabel and Andrés's whereabouts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Andrés argue again, and Isabel brutally beats Andrés to death with an oar. Isabel dreams that Andrés is back to kill her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Isabel is worried, and asks Gonzalo to find Andrés since he had left the night before and not returned. Gonzalo finds Gonzalo drowned in the lake.
episodes.title: Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is sure Isabel killed Andrés and tells this to Gaitana, who says that he pushed her into keeping her promise.
episodes.title: Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: Antonio talks with Simón and asks him about his argument with Valeria. Simón tells him about the relationship between Salvador and Valeria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca listens to Salvador and Valeria's conversation, and follows her to the restaurant, where she meets Salvador. There, she uncovers their affair.
episodes.title: Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca discovers that Valeria is packing to leave with Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is disappointed to learn that Isabel is not the woman he thought she was, and that his passion and desire made him go too far.
episodes.title: Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: Valeria's health worsens, but Isabel won't help her as she'd rather see her dead than by Salvador's side. Abigail offers to nurse Valeria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Salvador turns up in Valeria's room but is caught by Isabel, who forces him to leave the room. Valeria gets upset at Salvador's presence.
episodes.title: Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Salvador, as a peasant, attacks Gaitana, and is wary of everyone. At the Donosos', everyone is worried about Salvador's disappearance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Isabel is worried about the accusations made by Inírida Fernández against her and their possible consequences.
episodes.title: Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Despite everything, Salvador won't give up on his love for Valeria. He is summoned by the authorities to testify about Andrés Corona's death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: Isabel is told by her attorney that Inírida decided to drop the suit, so she feels really pleased. Evaristo catches Gaitana unawares with a serenade.
episodes.title: Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Ángela gets ill during the Antonio's graduation celebration;. Salvador promises Isabel he will marry her, but won't move away from the house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 115

episodes.synopsis: Isabel tells everyone in the house about her desire to marry Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 116

episodes.synopsis: Ángela urges Salvador to account for his behavior. Rebeca tries to murder Salvador. Isabel suggests to Salvador they should leave the house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 117

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is picked up by a couple of old people and gets into a dangerous situation with a gang of thieves without realizing it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 118

episodes.synopsis: While trying to run away, Salvador and the kid are caught and taken back to the house. Isabel is still very worried about Salvador's disappearance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 119

episodes.synopsis: Salvador manages to escape from the thieves but is attacked again. When he wakes up, he is Pedro José Donoso again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 120

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is talking about the hasty marriage of Isabel and Salvador. Salvador confronts Rebeca in front of the whole family for trying to kill him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 121

episodes.synopsis: Salvador asks Ángela and the Dominguez family for some time before he reveals the truth about himself.
episodes.title: Capítulo 122

episodes.synopsis: Salvador enters the Donoso house once again to give a concert without anyone noticing him. The sound of the piano makes everybody nervous.
episodes.title: Capítulo 123

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Salvador get married. Ángela, Antonio, Abigail, Simón and Valeria refuse to attend the wedding and stay away from the meeting.
episodes.title: Capítulo 124

episodes.synopsis: Salvador tells Isabel she can't be alone if she is to bear life by his side. This sounds strange to her, she feels as if she's married a stranger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 125

episodes.synopsis: Isabel gets nervous because she sometimes sees Salvador, and other times he transforms into Pedro José. Salvador tries to calm her down.
episodes.title: Capítulo 126

episodes.synopsis: In the basement, Salvador confronts Walter as Pedro José. He reproaches him for his attitude, making him see how greedy he is.
episodes.title: Capítulo 127

episodes.synopsis: Isabel refuses to be with Salvador because she is afraid of his behavior. Rebeca insists that Isabel know that Salvador has another woman and a son.
episodes.title: Capítulo 128

episodes.synopsis: Isabel arrives at Las Cruces to inquire about Salvador Cerinza's past.
episodes.title: Capítulo 129

episodes.synopsis: Fátima tells Isabel about Salvador's life one year ago before his attack, and how he changed upon waking up.
episodes.title: Capítulo 130

episodes.synopsis: Ángela and the others try to understand the situation with Salvador. Antonio tells them that Pedro José is not dead, but lives on in Salvador.
episodes.title: Capítulo 131

episodes.synopsis: Isabel comes back home, shocked by what she found out about Salvador; Rebeca is eager to hear what she's learned.
episodes.title: Capítulo 132

episodes.synopsis: Isabel arranges a family meeting and invites Dr. Robledo to review and confirm her suspicions about Pedro José's and Salvador's personality.
episodes.title: Capítulo 133

episodes.synopsis: Salvador trains Antonio in the operation of the factory, since he wants him to run the business as Pedro José had wished.
episodes.title: Capítulo 134

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca and Walter tell Isabel about the secret room. Puzzled, she looks for the door from the studio to the basement.
episodes.title: Capítulo 135

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is surprised by Isabel's discovery that Salvador does not exist, but is a fusion of Salvador's body with Pedro José's soul.
episodes.title: Capítulo 136

episodes.synopsis: Isabel confesses she killed Andrés. She tells them about the past life of Salvador, the man who died to let Pedro José come back to life.
episodes.title: Capítulo 137

episodes.synopsis: Eager to find Isabel and Salvador, the inspector interrogates Vicky and is puzzled to learn that Isabel admitted to killing Andrés.
episodes.title: Capítulo 138

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Salvador agree to help Cantalicia because of the suffering they inflicted on her. Salvador writes a farewell letter to Ángela.
episodes.title: Capítulo 139

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Isabel run away but are chased by the police. While trying to escape, they have an accident, killing her and leaving Salvador injured.
episodes.title: Capítulo 140

episodes.synopsis: When Salvador is taken to the hospital by ambulance, he suffers a new breakdown and changes his personality.
episodes.title: Capítulo 141

episodes.synopsis: Walter arrives at the hospital to kill Salvador. But when he kills somebody else by mistake, he loses his mind and ends up in jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 142

episodes.synopsis: Salvador recovers in the hospital and is taken to the Donosos'. Rebeca commits suicide. Antonio, Ángela and Simón take Salvador to Las Cruces.
episodes.title: Capítulo 143
